tasks.label: Validate Bicep Template
args: az bicep build --file infra/staticwebapp.bicep && Write-Host 'Bicep template validation completed successfully' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: Lint Bicep Template
args: az bicep lint --file infra/staticwebapp.bicep && Write-Host 'Bicep linting completed successfully' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: Install/Update Azure CLI
args: if (Get-Command az -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host 'Azure CLI already installed' -ForegroundColor Green; az upgrade } else { Write-Host 'Installing Azure CLI...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; winget install Microsoft.AzureCLI }
